original_title: The Click 2: Sex, Lies and Politics
overview: Ron Slick is a Washington lobbyist who comes by Dr. Fez's "clicker" invention, which makes women errogeneously ex-tra-cited; Slick uses the clicker on a senator, a reporter, a police officer and two federal agents. This entry may be part of the seven episode TV series, released as a full feature.
title: The Click 2: Sex, Lies and Politics
